Name: The Enthralling Realms: An Alchemist's Tale
About the game: Play this challenging match-3 game! Ever since they were children, two freinds trained to become powerful alchemists. They both show great potential but only one have them has great ambitions - and ambitions can be dangerous. As an experiment goes terribly wrong one of them dies! Can alchemy and magic even revive the dead? Find the answer while selling potions and talismans to the people who need your help! One thing is certain: she wonâ€™t give up without a fight. - 50 challenging match3 levels! - 20 alchemical potions and magical items to master - 5 regions filled with special ingredients and new tasks
